import React from "react"; import Rating from "../componets/Ratings"; import data from "../data"; export default function ProductScreen(props){ const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); /* Check to see if the product ID is foind, if not - display message */ if(!product){ return
Product does not exsist
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Brand: {product.brand}
  • Price: {'$' + product.price}
  • Features:

    {product.features}

  • Price
    {product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock>0? (In Stock) : (Unavailable) }
); }
